text: Stepmother Ann Todd and doctor Christopher Lee are also effectively around. They believe all you see and hear! NOT for the first time the homely mug of Sidney James has pumped life into a slim, strained comedy. He does his rescue act in "Double Bunk" (Leicester-square Theatre, "A").
handwritten_text: Stepmother Ann Todd and doctor Christopher Lee are also effectively around. They believe all you see and hear! NOT for the first time the homely mug of Sidney James has pumped life into a slim, strained comedy. He does his rescue act in "Double Bunk" (Leicester-square Theatre, "A").
